snippet.title: Metal Bringer 2nd Trailer
snippet.description:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2334170/

Metal Bringer, the newest title by Samurai Bringer developers Alphawing, is coming to Steam and PlayStation®5 this winter!

Use nimble androids called Labor and gigantic mechs called Arms to wipe out waves of enemies in this roguelite action game. Grow stronger over multiple runs and customize your loadout to become unbeatable!

■ PLAYISM Page: https://playism.com/game/metal-bringer/
